name: Playing the Perfect Fox-Eyed Villain
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: A Crazed Sociopath. A Monster Who Wears Human Skin. The Demon Of The North&#039s Frontlines. The Smiling Executioner. I Have Come To Perfectly Act As Julian, The Insane Fox-Eyed Character Feared By The Whole Empire. [Character Trait «Formal Speech»] You Speak In A Formal Manner To Everyone Regardless Of Age. &quotIsn&#039t It Fine If I’m Just Talking To Myself?&quotOriginal NovelOriginal Webtoon: Naver Webtoon, Naver Series
